events.text: You just got a very helpful journal! It will keep track of all the important information you will encounter.
Then you will know that theres new information present in the journal that you've collected, maybe even a whole new page!
So don't be afraid by the large walls of text, the journal will keep track of the important bit so read as much, [i] or as little [/i] as you want.
And don't worry about your collected information being lost with your "replacement", the notebook will still be available with all its information for any future operators.
